alert.note: Alert for McPherson; Rice; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 2:20AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of McPherson, northeastern Reno, southeastern Rice and southeastern Saline Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 220 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Marquette to 6 miles northwest of Inman to near Nickerson. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hutchinson, Mcpherson, Lindsborg, Inman, Buhler, Nickerson, Galva, Canton, Marquette, Little River, Gypsum, Windom, Willowbrook, Mcpherson Airport, Roxbury and Bridgeport. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 50 and 78. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for central Kansas.
